MissionText.name: Assembly Specialty Kit
MissionText.description: Open the Rank 1 Specialty Kit Package in your inventory, <font color='#FF7F00'>read the Rank 1 book</font>, and <font color='#FF7F00'>equip every piece of your Specialty Kit</font>.

MissionText.name: Unavailable
MissionText.description: Unavailable

MissionText.name: Cannon Cove Crackshot
MissionText.description: Score 75,000 points in the Cannon Cove Shooting Gallery in Gnarled Forest.

MissionText.name: Vertigo Debris
MissionText.description: Smash 10 smashables on the Vertigo Loop Racetrack.

MissionText.name: Dragonmaw Debris
MissionText.description: Smash 10 Smashables on the Dragonmaw Chasm Racetrack.

MissionText.name: Drive Five
MissionText.description: Compete in 5 races on any racetrack.

MissionText.name: Flower Hour
MissionText.description: Use your Water Sprayer to grow 15 flowers.

MissionText.name: Cannon Cove Champion
MissionText.description: Score an overall total of 500,000 points in the Cannon Cove Shooting Gallery.

MissionText.name: Time Trooper
MissionText.description: Smash 10 Stromlings and 5 Mechs during the Battle of Nimbus Station.

MissionText.name: Super Survivor
MissionText.description: Survive for 2 minutes in Avant Gardens Survival in 3 different games.

MissionText.name: Pet Cove Clean Up
MissionText.description: Smash 5 fences and 5 doghouses and Quick Build 3 birdhouses in Pet Cove.

MissionText.name: Pet Cove Perk Up
MissionText.description: Smash 5 hydrants and 10 flowers and Quick Build the bridge in Pet Cove.

MissionText.name: Back to the Front
MissionText.description: Smash 10 Stromlings and 5 Mechs and Quick Build 5 turrets in Avant Gardens.

MissionText.name: Monument Maintenance
MissionText.description: Smash 5 lasers, 5 guard rails and 5 fans on the Monument in Avant Gardens.

MissionText.name: Mechanized Assault
MissionText.description: Smash 5 Mechs, then Quick Build 5 turrets and 3 Satellite Beacons in Avant Gardens.

MissionText.name: Unavailable
MissionText.description: Unavailable

MissionText.name: Robot, Pirates and Rocks
MissionText.description: Smash 5 Mechs in Avant Gardens, 5 Stromling Pirates in Gnarled Forest and 5 rock piles in Forbidden Valley.

MissionText.name: Ultra Survivor
MissionText.description: Survive for 5 minutes in Avant Gardens Survival.

MissionText.name: Chaos Ahoy!
MissionText.description: Smash 5 Stromling Pirates, destroy 5 explosive crates and collect 5 cannonballs in Gnarled Forest.

MissionText.name: Sweet Siren Songs
MissionText.description: Quick Build 5 Mermaid Sirens and smash 15 Stromling Pirates in Gnarled Forest.

MissionText.name: Tiki Party
MissionText.description: Spin and then extinguish 10 Tiki Torches in Gnarled Forest.

MissionText.name: Mushroom Masher
MissionText.description: Smash any 15 mushrooms in Gnarled Forest.

MissionText.name: Victory in the Valley
MissionText.description: Smash 5 Dark Ronin, 5 Maelstrom Horsemen and extinguish 50 candles in Forbidden Valley.

MissionText.name: Rock Fury
MissionText.description: Smash 10 rock piles in Forbidden Valley, then find Brick Fury and lure 5 Maelstrom Horsemen into his firing range.

MissionText.name: Avant Guardin'
MissionText.description: Smash 5 Stromling Mechs, 5 Dark Spiderlings and 10 Monument lasers in Avant Gardens.

MissionText.name: Cannon Cove Commander
MissionText.description: Score an overall total of 1,000,000 points in the Cannon Cove Shooting Gallery.

MissionText.name: Gnarly Hike
MissionText.description: Smash 10 Stromling Pirates and collect 5 bananas and 5 cannonballs in Gnarled Forest.

MissionText.name: Cannon Cove Corsair
MissionText.description: Score 150,000 in the Cannon Cove Shooting Gallery.

MissionText.name: Time Thrasher
MissionText.description: Smash 10 Hammer Stromlings and 5 Dark Spiderlings in the Battle of Nimbus Station.

MissionText.name: Nexus Orders
MissionText.description: <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Nexus Jay</font> in Nimbus Plaza.
